name: Positive Life Psychology & Wellbeing Clinic Pte Ltd

reviews.text: I've been seeing Sherin for close to a year after experiencing the biggest trauma in my life so far. I don't think I would be nearly as balanced, as forgiving, or as positive about life today if it wasn't for her. Her relaxed yet still assured demeanor made it easy for me to communicate with her from the first session. It's still a journey but at times I've been surprised by the progress made (as someone who is new to therapy). I'm actually excited to work on myself more with her guidance and expertise. Even though this has been the hardest year of my life, Sherin is a huge reason I feel like I'm still standing on my feet. So so grateful to have found her

Truly life changing for me. Sherin does a great job and it's been close to a year for me with positive life clinic. My perceptions and the way that I perceive and see things have changed so much. Thank you so much.

In the midst of what felt like my life was falling apart and ending I would’ve never guessed that the first time I walked into dr sherins office my life was on its way to a very liberating beginning.
She is the reason I show up every week . Her bright colourful persona is warm and welcoming . With time childhood , troubles , patterns become an easy jigsaw puzzle to solve as she lays it all down with so much clarity . I have gone through some of the hardest times in my life with my head high because that is what I learnt through our sessions . I learnt to believe in myself . I found a friend , guardian and an extremely skilled professional in her . I am forever grateful and I will not forget the work I’ve done with her for life .

It's been a life changing experience for me. I've learnt so much, especially about myself and how to program myself better. Ms Gomez's guidance has helped me so much in my work life as well as my personal life. I will forever be grateful.

Sherin of Positive Life Asia, has not only been an advisor, but also a wellness coach. I worked with her for the past two months, for some targets in personal and professional life and with her sessions  managed to completely change my perspective of life. If you are looking for some serious transformations and outcomes do connect with her.
